{{also|萬歲|万岁}}
==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|ばん|せい|yomi=on|k2=ぜい|r=2}}
Japanese simplified form (shinjitai, [[新字体]]) of the chinese originated word, [[萬歲]] (wànsuì) in [[kyūjitai]] ([[旧字体]]). To be compared to chinese simplified version: [[万岁]].

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/banzei/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ばんぜい|kyu=萬歲}}

# an extremely long period of time
# long life and glory
# an expression of celebration
# death

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|ばん|さい|k2=ざい|yomi=on|r=2}}
Common reading of {{m|ja|万歳|banzei}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/banzai/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ばんざい|kyu=萬歲}}

# an extremely long period of time
# an expression of celebration
# (from raising ones hands three times in cheer) raising ones hands
# (from raising ones hands in defeat) business troubles, bankruptcy

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|まん|さい|k2=ざい|yomi=on|r=2}}

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/manzai/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|まんざい|kyu=萬歲}}

# an extremely long period of time
# song and dance to celebrate a new year
# a song sung to celebrate a new year
# an expression of celebration
